story.kicker_image_caption: MDSU BSTC Exam 2016: Check out the scores now
story.storykicker: Maharshi Dayanand Saraswati University (MDSU) has delared the results of the Basic School Teacher Course (BSTC) pre examination.
story.storybody:
Maharshi Dayanand Saraswati University (MDSU) has declared the results of the Basic School Teacher Course (BSTC) pre examination.

All the candidate can check the results on its official website, the link for which is www. bstcmdsu2016.com

The examination was conducted by the university on May 8, 2016.

As per official data, over five lakh students were registered out of which 4, 78,818 appeared for the examination this year.

According to media reports, Ajaypal Mingar has secured the top position in the examination from general category.

Steps to check the results:

  • The candidates need to log on to the official website, www.bstcmdsu2016.com
  • Click on the link, "BSTC-2016 Result"
  • Enter your roll number and name
  • The result will be displayed
  • The candidates need to take a print out of the same for future reference.

About MDSU:

The Maharshi Dayanand Saraswati University (MDSU)-Ajmer was established on August 1, 1987. Since its inception the university has conducted the examination of nearly 1,500,000 students in colleges throughout the state. There are 89 government-run and private colleges affiliated with the university, with as many as 24 teaching departments.

 

Read: JEE Advanced 2016: Check your ORS image, scanned responses at http://www.jeeadv.ac.in/
